Package net.happybrackets.core

Class BroadcastManager

java.lang.Object
net.happybrackets.core.BroadcastManager
public class BroadcastManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages broadcast communication - i.e., one to all comms. You would mainly use it to send broadcast messages and listen to broadcast messages. However, these functions are wrapped in the HB class and should be accessed there. Created by ollie on 1/06/2016. Multiple interface behaviour add by Sam Gillespie on 11/08/2016.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  BroadcastManager.OnListener
    Call back interface for listening to all interfaces where the specific interface matters
    static interface  BroadcastManager.OnTransmitter
    Call back interface for sending to all interfaces where the specific interface matters

  • Constructor Details

    • BroadcastManager

      public BroadcastManager​(java.lang.String address, int port)
      Create a new BroadcastManager.
      Parameters:
      address - should be a multicast address.
      port - The port we are sending on

  • Method Details

    • setThreadSleepTime

      public void setThreadSleepTime​(int threadSleepTime)
      Enable setting of sleep time
      Parameters:
      threadSleepTime - the amount of time we want our broadcaster to sleep

    • setDisableSend

      public void setDisableSend​(boolean disable)
      Set to disable sending messages from this broadcaster
      Parameters:
      disable - disable sending

    • setWaitForStart

      public void setWaitForStart​(boolean wait)
      Cause the BroadcastManager to wait before testing the network ports We need to set this here so we can do it from pluging, otherwise, tests will faile
      Parameters:
      wait - set to true if we will wait 5 seconds for a start

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Returns the port we are configured for
      Returns:
      the port configured

    • startRefreshThread

      public java.lang.Thread startRefreshThread()

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Calls dispose on all receivers (OSCReceiver) and transmitters (OSCTransmitter).

    • refreshBroadcaster

      public void refreshBroadcaster()
      Rebuilds this BroadcastManager. Effectively deletes this instance and creates a new BroadcastManager.

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object... args)
      Broadcast an OSCMessage msg over the multicast group.
      Parameters:
      name - the message string to send.
      args - the args to the message.

    • forAllTransmitters

      public void forAllTransmitters​(BroadcastManager.OnTransmitter onTransmitter)
      Execute onTransmitter.cb(NetworkInterface, OSCTransmitter) for all transmitters.
      Parameters:
      onTransmitter - Interface message

      public static java.net.InetAddress getBroadcast​(java.net.NetworkInterface ni)
      Get the broadcast address for a particular network interface
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      brodcast address if it exists
